Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <Cryptographic> ok thanks.  and can someone ELI5 what is BTCH.   does it replace HUSH?  or a separate project ?

Author: Gateway#3763
Content:
[dscrd-hush] <Pixelised> BTCH doesn't replace Hush. It's a separate project. From the website "BTCH is not something that has ever existed before, it is not a chain split nor code fork of HUSH, 
nor ZEC, nor BTC, it is a KMD asset chain with imported UTXO dataset. "

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <ectrader> even it doesn't replace hush, but in my eyes is BTCH much better then hush, because it is a unique technique

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> @Cryptographic BTCH is a "sister coin", BTCH is based on KMD, while HUSH is older and based directly from Zcash source code. Both have their own genesis blocks and their own blockchains

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> I've just learned that VerusHash option has finally landed in KMD source code, which is needed to "revive" BTCH with VerusHash

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> it's still pretty bleeding edge, not yet in the `jl777` or `dev` branches yet, but I will be playing around with it. This is one of the pieces that needed to come into place for BTCH, so this is very nice

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> BTCH can also do VRSC-style staking, and have "eras" where the block reward changes in different ways, which is more flexible that "old skool" halvening schedule. Not sure how those will be used yet, but it's there as an option

Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> I've heard that KMD is going to auto-upgrade all assetchains to Sapling, so no matter how BTCH changes in the short or long term, it will have the Sapling upgrade. Which means zaddr transactions become crazy fast and possible on a mobile wallet/etc.

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> This is still being worked on, no dates or block heights are known, just that it is coming üòÉ

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> and to remind people, choosing VerusHash has landed in KMD `FSM` branch (which is the very bleeding edge, more so than the `jl777` or `dev` branches), so progress on the "BTCH revival" can commence. I would love help from some people, hopefully that are familiar with KMD or want to learn, in trying out various options for the new chain. There are many many new things to try and community involvement would be very helpful. Mostly we need to decide, exactly what the size and schedule of the block reward will be
